text.title: Italian writer Umberto Eco dies, age 84
text.head: Italian writer Umberto Eco dies, age 84
Sources

list.item: Kevin Rawlinson. "Umberto Eco, Italian novelist and intellectual, dies aged 84" — The Guardian , February 20, 2016
Martin Chilton. "Umberto Eco, author of The Name of the Rose, dies aged 84" — The Daily Telegraph (UK) , February 20, 2016
"Italian writer Umberto Eco dies at 84" — BBC News Online , February 20, 2016
Peter Andrew Hart. "Umberto Eco Dead At 84; Italian Philosopher Wrote 'The Name Of The Rose'" — Huffington Post , February 20, 2016
